title: APRIL FOOLS 2016 SKIN IDEAS
body:
This is my best idea I have so far so here it goes...

Definitely not Cho'Gath: Wears a baron costume and starts looking more like the real thing as his stacks get bigger.
Q: Baron tentacle comes out of ground
W: Spits out acid like baron
E & R: Same as classic

Definitely not Elise: Human form wears a Vilemaw costume. Spider form looks more like the real thing except no spider nest thingy on her back.
Human Q: Shoots out Vilemaw's range transparent looking single target web. Spider Q: Same as classic
Human W: Same as classic. Spider W: Elise's auto attacks look like Vilemaw's fast melee attacks using 2 of it's legs.
Human E: Same as classic. Spider E: Same as classic.

Definitely not Shyvana: Wears a dragon costume and looks more like the real thing when ulting.
Human Q: Same as classic. Dragon Q: Same as classic.
Human W: Same as classic. Dragon W: Flaps wings maybe?
Human E: Shoots fireball that looks like the dragon's fireball. Dragon E: Same as human except it shoots from the mouth.

Those are my ideas, if I had to give them a price I would make Cho'Gath 1350RP, Elise 950RP, Shyvana 950RP.
Remember these are only IDEAS so don't get too mad at me if I didn't have much ideas for Shyvana or Elise as I do not play them much :(
Thanks for taking the time to read my post! :D

replies.body:
You misses the point of April Fools, 

It should be a Definitely Not Cho'gath skin where it looks EXACTLY like his Classic in-game, but you won't know until you've bought it (as the splash art would indicate otherwise), which they would refund you the RP later on.

Now that's what we call a good April Fools.
Shyvana is a dragon, why would she wear a dragon costume?

> You misses the point of April Fools,

It should be a Definitely Not Cho'gath skin where it looks EXACTLY like his Classic in-game, but you won't know until you've bought it (as the splash art would indicate otherwise), which they would refund you the RP later on.

Now that's what we call a good April Fools.

True dat
